hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that beyond the #river in the Water Temple# waits #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Wallet#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #collecting cuccos# rewards #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Death Mountain Crater# is a foolish choice.

GC (Maze).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find #the Ice Cavern#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that ##Hyrule Castle## has #3# major items.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Slingshot#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that a #storm near the castle# reveals a #generic grotto#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##the Market## has #14# major items.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #the Stone of Agony#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #a Huge Rupee# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right and left hands# lie...^ #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #a Ganon's Castle Small Key# and #a Strength Upgrade#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that the #rainbow bridge# leads to #Dodongo's Cavern#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Wallet#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #a Goron Tunic#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple Boulder Maze Upper Chest

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Slingshot#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #an Ocarina# and #a Deku Shield#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Nayru's Love#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #a Forest Temple Small Key# can be found in #the Market#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the path of #hearts#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Heavy Block Fourth Chest

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Nayru's Love#.

ToT (Left).text: Ganondorf used to be an adventurer like me, but then he took a light arrow to the knee.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

ZF (Fairy).text: What is a Hylian? A miserable little pile of secrets!

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# hoards #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that ##the Forest Temple## has #7# major items.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Gerudo's Fortress# is on the path to #the Tower#.
